scripts.build: vite build && cd studio && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/studio && cp -r studio/dist/* dist/studio/ && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const p = 'dist/studio/index.html'; let h = fs.readFileSync(p, 'utf8'); h = h.replace(/\"\/static\//g, '\"/studio/static/'); h = h.replace(/\"\/vendor\//g, '\"/studio/vendor/'); fs.writeFileSync(p, h);"
